about_the_game:
Killing Floor: Uncovered is an exciting live action film collaboration between videogame developer/publisher, Tripwire Interactive and film collective, Type AB. Inspired by the popular videogame franchise, Killing Floor: Uncovered delivers an action-packed, live action experience that both gamers and horror film fans will love!

About Type AB
Type AB is an LA-based film collective comprised of filmmakers Brian Netto and Adam Schindler. Their first film, the festival favorite DELIVERY: THE BEAST WITHIN was released In Spring 2014. They are currently in post-production on the thriller SHUT IN, which teams Type AB with the producer of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY and INSIDIOUS.

About Type AB
Type AB is an LA-based film collective comprised of filmmakers Brian Netto and Adam Schindler. Their first film, the festival favorite DELIVERY: THE BEAST WITHIN was released In Spring 2014. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
